mapper.insert: insert into user_info (id, name, password, nickName, email, phoneNumber, birth, gender, userType, regDate) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{userType}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: update user_info set password = #{password}, nickName = #{nickName}, email = #{email}, phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber}, gender = #{gender} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from user_info where id=#{id} and password=#{password}
select * from user_info where id=#{id} and password=#{password}
